pageContext.claim: “They cross now, and we bring them right back. In the old days, it would take years to get them back. They wouldn't get them back. Other administrations, like the previous administration, essentially didn't bring them back.”
pageContext.analysis: The practice Trump describes of immediately returning most unauthorized immigrants has been in place for decades. It's demonstrably false to claim the Obama administration "essentially" did not deport or return unauthorized migrants.
